english: I'm loaded, Ertugrul
We're going to have a child.

text: Üstte mavi gök altta yağız yer…

text: Bütün otağımız bu haber için yanar tutuşurdu

english: Run to the horses without looking back, Halima

He was fighting them.
I hit the Mongols on the way out.
I managed to kill them and escape.
Halima!
Let's split up here.
They couldn't have gone any further.

text: Gözünüzü dört açın Ertuğrul'u bulmadan obaya dönmek yok
english: Keep your eyes open and don't go back to the Oba until we find Ertugrul.

Welcome to Noyan's hell, Ertuğrul

Yes, I'm the devil of hell.

I want you to know that I'm very happy.
What do you want from me?

text: Dostluğundan başka bir şey istemediğime emin olabilirsin, Türk
english: You can be sure I don't want anything but your friendship, Turk.

text: Biz Moğollar, dostumuzu ve düşmanımızı iyi seçeriz
english: We Mongols choose our friend and our enemy well.

text: İsteriz ki Ertuğrul bize dost olsun
english: We want Ertugrul to be our friend

text: Siz bana dost değil düşman bile olamazsınız
english: You can't be friends. You can't be enemies.
Don't worry, Ertugrul.
Give him water.
They said you wouldn't give up easily.
The cavalry is on its way.
Your men are out looking for you.
If they can find it.

text: Sizin gibi kancıklar er meydanında olduğu sürece zafer her daim bizimdir
english: As long as bitches like you are in private, victory is always ours.

text: Herkes farklı kollardan dağılsın Kimse iz bırakmasın
english: Everyone spread out from different arms. No one leaves a trace.
No, God, no, moongirl.
Turgut, my child.
Moongirl
My child, Aygirl.
Turgut, pull yourself together, child.

text: Ne mutlu sana ki karın şehit oldu
english: It's a good thing your wife is a martyr.
Let's put him to bed.
No.
Turgut
Easy... easy
Oh, girl.

text: Bu şan, bu şeref iki cihanda da sana yeter
english: This glory is enough for both of you.

text: Rabbim inşallah cennetinde ikinizi de vuslata erdirir
english: May my Lord bless you both in heaven.
Moongirl, moongirl No Aygirl, moongirl
Turgut... it's all right, child, it's all right.
Other than that.
The Gökçe that grew up without a father
Let's embrace the moon as a girl

Oh, God, keep my mind on it.
Sir!
Sir!

text: Sakin ol Doğan Alp Sakin ol!
english: Calm down, Born Alpine Calm down!

text: Ne badireler atlattı o Bunu da atlatacak
english: What a mess he's been through. He'll get over it.
Do you hear me?
The Noyan heretic has entered.

text: Bu insanlara bunu yapan zalim yaşadıkça nefes almak bize haram olsun
english: It's forbidden for us to breathe as long as we live the cruel life that has done this to these people.

text: Moğollar zalimlikleriyle her yeri işgal ediyor
english: Mongols occupy the land with their cruelty.

text: Almak istedikleri diyara önce korkuları saldırıyor
english: The land they want to take is first attacked by fear.

to be put in the ground

To bury my daughter too

Our generation will see the spring

Before death comes and I'm dead.
I'm not getting out of this well.

text: Hem benim derdim ne ola ki Hayme Ana?

What about your problem?
What about your pain?
From this gay well where our obama fell
How will you get it out, Hayme Ana?
That's it, folks.

text: evlatlarımın yasını nasıl tutarım Demir Usta?

I buried my pain in my heart
As long as this nation exists
Let us suffer

text: Yaşlı kadınları ve gebeleri geçici olarak çadırlara yerleştirdik beyim
english: We've temporarily placed old women and pregnant women in tents, sir.
And what is the condition of our martyrs?
Where the shooting took place our martyrs
His burial arrangements are almost complete.

text: Akşam cenaze namazından sonra şehitlerimizi toprağa vereceğiz beyim
english: After the evening funeral prayer, we'll bury our martyrs, sir.
What's the latest on the wounded, Artuk?
We have divided the mosque with a veil, my lord.

text: Orada kadınlarla erkekleri ebe kadınlarla tedaviye aldık
english: We treated women and men there with midwife women.

text: Var olun. Elleriniz dert görmesin beylerim

text: Bildiğiniz gibi kardeşlerimiz Kayılara kucak açtık

text: Onları perişan, aç, susuz dağlarda bırakmadık
english: And We left them not in the mountains miserable, hungry, and thirsty.
We've patched him up.

text: Peki ne yapacağız beyim? Bu gidişat nereye kadardır?

It's up to us to stand by them.

That's the point.

text: Moğol ejderhası bütün güçleriyle üstümüze doğru geldiğinde

The dog just wanted you to know, sir.

text: Sultan Alaeddin, bahar gelir gelmez tüm Oğuz boylarıyla bir olup üzerinize gelecek
english: Sultan Alaeddin will come at you as soon as spring comes, with all the Oğuz families.
Alaeddin thinks he's cunning.
The new world is ours, Karabey.

I'm sorry for your loss, Mother Hayme.

text: rüzgarın acıtmadığı tenini diri diri yakmışlar

english: He's not just my brother Hayme's son.
Ertugrul was my son, too.
If I don't answer for his blood

text: bu utançla yaşamak da bana haram olsun
english: May it be forbidden for me to live in this shame.
Fear does not suit your beautiful eyes.

text: Kızın yaşamasını istersen yemekte mesele çıkartmayasın
english: If you want her to live, don't make trouble at dinner.
You'll be sorry if Noyan takes his anger out on her.

english: Aleppo Emir made friends with El Aziz

text: benim cesur savaşçılarımın kanını acımadan döken yiğit sensin
english: You are the brave one who shed the blood of my brave warriors without mercy.
So, the one who rapes women?
The one who kills babies on his bed

text: bununla da övünen soysuz da sensin
english: You're the bastard who brags about it and brags about it.
That's right, Ertugrul.
We're a steppe fire.

text: Bozkır bir kere tutuştu mu, günlerce yanar
english: Once the moor burns, it burns for days
It burns age as well as the dried-up.

text: Dünyanın gördüğü en büyük devleti kuruyoruz
english: We're building the biggest government the world has ever seen.
Genghishan took half the world
We'll take the rest.

text: Böyle kutsal bir davada üç beş leşin ne önemi var?
english: In such a holy cause, what does a corpse or two matter?
Your government is like a fruitless tree.
You're gonna rip it off.
The sun will burn, you will disappear
All that remains of you is cruelty.
And then he attacks from right to left.

text: kuduz köpekler gibi kendini dişleyerek yok olacak senin kurduğun devlet
english: The government you built will be destroyed by biting yourself like a rabid dog.

text: Umarım ki o kuduz köpeklerin saldırdıkları arasında anan Hayme
english: I hope your mother Hayme was attacked by those rabid dogs.
Your brother was born.
And your girl doesn't exist.

text: Avradını da kendin gibi savaşçı seçmişsin

text: Elimizden kurtulup, dayın Korkut'un obasına sığındığını öğrendik

text: Selçuklu Hanedanı'ndan Halime Sultan en fazla birkaç gün daha yaşar

Another winter, if he's lucky.

text: Sadede gel Fırsatın varken beni neden öldürmedin?

text: Senin gibi büyük bir savaşçının ölüsünden çok…
english: More than the death of a great warrior like you...
Ertuğrul is more useful to me.

text: Ben ancak Azrail’in olarak işine yararım Noyan
english: I'm only good for you as a reaper, Noyan.
Mother, son of a...
...the families of the boy in the room...
...to live in peace and peace...

text: …gerçeği görmeni ve bizimle olmanı istiyorum Ertuğrul
english: I want you to see the truth and be with us, Ertugrul.
♪ To be with us ♪ ♪ Walk with us ♪
I want you to win with us.
To fight like a traitor...

text: …döşeğindeki bebeleri öldürmek bizim için kazanç değil, utançtır, Noyan
english: It's not a win, it's a shame, Noyan, to kill the babies in your bed.
We live in honor

text: Haçlıların başına nasıl bela olduğunu öğrendik Ertuğrul
english: We've learned how to trouble the Crusaders, Ertuğrul.
We know you as well as you do

text: Sultan Alaeddin çok yakında mutlaka ölecek
english: Sultan Alaeddin will surely die soon.
Then you'll all be exposed.

text: Sana obanı ve sevdiklerini korumak için bir fırsat veriyorum
english: I'm giving you an opportunity to protect the obans and the ones you love.

text: Ya şimdi bizimle bir olur dost kalırsınız…
english: You can be friends with us now...

text: …ya da tüm düşmanlarımız gibi yok olursunuz
english: Or you'll disappear like all our enemies.
Take your time with my offer.

text: Sabah şu güzel sofranın tadı şarabın esrikliği geçsin…
english: In the morning, the taste of this lovely table, the pristineness of the wine...
We'll sit down, we'll talk for a long time.

text: Doğduğum günden beri Cengiz Han’ın ordularıyla savaşırız
english: From the day I was born we have fought Genghis Khan's armies
All my loved ones died one by one

text: Buna ağabeyim Sungur Tekin de dâhil
english: Including my brother, Sungur Tekin.
Now you can tell me about friendship.

text: Ben yaşadığım sürece bu dostluk asla olmayacak
english: As long as I live, this friendship will never happen.
Sungur Tekin

text: Hayatımda gördüğüm en iyi en zeki savaşçılardan biri
english: He's one of the best smart fighters I've ever seen in my life.

text: Bizimle bir olarak bunu bir kez daha kanıtladı
english: He's proved it once again as one with us.

text: Şimdi Ögeday’ın yanında savaşıp yiğitliğini gösteriyor
english: Now he's fighting alongside Item and showing his courage
As much as you're a lousy warrior...
You're a dirty liar.

text: Yalan söyleyip söylemediğimi yakında göreceksin Ertuğrul
english: You'll soon see if I'm lying, Ertugrul.

text: Sungur Tekin baharda Moğol ordusuyla buraya gelecek
english: Sungur Tekin will come here in the spring with the Mongol army.
Now go think of my words.

text: İçinde biraz da olsa insan olduğuna inanmam için…
english: To make me believe there's even a little bit of people in it.
...let the girl stay with me.
Ahh!
Ahh!
That's enough! Don't hit me anymore!
My heart says you're not dead

text: Beni bu dünyada evladımla yalnız bırakmadın der
english: He says you didn't leave me alone in this world with my son.
Please don't be dead.

text: Ne olur beni evladımla yalnız bırakmamış ol
english: Please don't leave me alone with my child.
Cry, baby. Cry.
Mother, don't let Ertugrul die
Ana didn't leave us.
So you're still going to resist?
Let's see how strong you are.
Ahh!
Ahh!

text: Ertuğrul eğlenmek istiyor O zaman eğlence başlasın
english: Ertugrul wants to have fun Then let the fun begin

text: Ertuğrul'suz kayı topal insana benzer hatun
english: Without Ertugrul, the apricot looks like a lame person.
I was the mind of this oban.
He's got a heart too
He's been in a lot of trouble.

text: Lakin her kuyudan da çıkmayı bildi
english: But he knows how to get out of every well

text: Bu sefer de dönüp gelecek derdim
english: I'd say he'd come back this time.

text: Hiçbir bela onu alt edemez derdim
english: I'd say no trouble can beat him.

text: Lakin kardeşim bu sefer uçmağa vardı
english: But my brother's gone flying this time

text: Bu sebepten bundan gayrı onun evladı…
english: That's why he's the son of...
...she's our child.
You take good care of Halima
Don't worry, sir.
Mr. Ertugrul has become a martyr

text: Ölümün en şereflisi nasip oldu ona
english: He was blessed with the highest honor of death.
Apricot must pack up at once.
There's a thousand pain in every tent
If you don't get the upper hand...
...everyone will fall apart.
We say two obas unite.

text: Bu sayede birkaç bahar nefes alırız
english: So we can breathe a few springes
There's no way out of this right now.

text: Lakin birlik olmanın da başka müşkülleri vardır
english: But there are other doubts about unity.
Like what?
The Dodurgo Obas is actually without a gentleman.

text: Korkut Bey ihtiyarlığında Aytolun’la bahar yaşama sevdasına girmiştir
english: In his old age, Mr. Korkut fell in love with Aytolun.

text: Aytolun yavaş yavaş otağın hâkimiyetini ister
english: Little by little, Aytol wants the control of his pasture.
Even though he's on the outs with Tugtekin...
...then he'll have her in his shadow, too.

text: Allah Allah, hatun. Bu kadar acımız varken bütün bunları nasıl gördün?
english: God, woman, how did you see all this when we had so much pain?
I'm just saying, sir.

text: İttifak ettiğin dostlarını iyi tanı ki…
english: Know well your allies...

text: …ayrılık vakti geldiğinde en büyük düşmanın olmasınlar
english: When it's time to leave, don't let them be your worst enemy.
You're chasing the wrong guy, Noyan.
You'll never be able to convince him.
Just get this game over with.
Take him away and tie him up.
Take him away and tie him up!

text: Hayme bacım hiç gün yüzü görmedi
english: Hayme sister never saw the light of day
Moreover, the death of Ertuğrul (Ertugrul) added to his suffering

text: Sen demez miydin baba biz göçer Türkmenler…
english: Didn't you say, Dad, we migrated Turkmen...

text: …atımızda kendimizle beraber acımızı da taşırız diye?
english: ...that we'll carry our pain with us on our horse?
I've been ruined by my mother's death.
And we still haven't found who killed him.

text: Ama onun canını alanı bin defa öldürmezsem…
english: But if I don't kill the man who took his life a thousand times...
...and this breath is forbidden to me.
Oh, my God.

text: Gel hatun Gel otur şöyle. Gel
english: Come here, girl.

text: Gayrı sen bu işleri bırak artık
english: Don't worry about it.
Get yourself a co-host.

text: Var olasın beyim Ben de ne vakittir bunu düşünürüm
english: As long as you exist, sir, I've been thinking about that for a long time.
The rug house during the day, the sisters...
...and in the evening there'll be nothing left to do.
In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.
Here you go.
What's your decision tomorrow, Dad?
I say we make two obas one.
How's this gonna work?
Let's leave the Alpine administration to the Apricots.
Their men even survived the Mongols.

text: Obadaki diğer meselelerle de bizim beyler ilgilensin
english: We'll let the gentlemen deal with the other issues in the Oba.
Thanks.
My late mother used to say...
...if you make a decision...
...always think of the hard times.
It's not my place to interfere in the affairs of the privates.

text: Lakin eğer iki oba arasında fitne olursa…
english: But if there's a fit between the two obas...
...who then wielded the power of the Alps...
...will have the power to know
What do you mean?
I mean...

text: …Alplerin başına sen geçesin İdaresini sen alasın
english: ...you take over the Alps, you take over.
He'll take it.
We don't want to get into trouble on the day of the trial.

text: Sana süt getirdim evlat Kana kana içesin diye
english: I brought you milk, son, so you can drink it to the blood.

text: Sana Fil Suresi’nin hikâyesini anlatacağım evlat
english: I'll tell you the story of the Elephant House, son.

text: Minicik kuşların kocaman filleri nasıl yendiğini anlatan sureyi
english: About how tiny birds beat giant elephants.
Many centuries ago, the cruel Ebrehe...
...to destroy Mecca...
...he had prepared an army of elephants.

text: Ebrehe yola çıktığında tüm Mekke ahalisi korkudan dağlara kaçmıştı
english: When Ebrehe set out, all the people of Mecca fled in fear to the mountains.

text: Ebrehe, bu kocaman ordusuyla Mekke’ye doğru yürürken…
english: Ebrehe, walking with this huge army to Mecca...
...and all of a sudden the birds appeared in the sky.
This was actually the battle of birds and elephants.
It was the battle of right and superstition.

text: Kuşlar gagalarında tuttukları taşları üstlerine bırakarak…
english: The birds leave the stones in their beaks above them.
...and destroyed the army of Ebrehe.

text: Şu hayatta sen kendini ne zaman kuşlar gibi küçük ve savunmasız hissedersen…

text: O Tapınakçılar bile bana böyle zulmetmedi
english: Even those Templars didn't oppress me like that.

text: Onların verdiği zehir bile bundan daha lezzetlidir
english: Even the poison they give is more delicious than this.
So that's it, huh?

text: Git o vakit onların zehrini iç
english: Then go drink their poison.
Wait, wait, wait.

text: Dur dur, otur. Otur, şaka yaptım
english: Sit down, I'm kidding.
Turgut?
Brother?
Ahh!
Ahh!
In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.
In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.
Welcome, my daughter.
Come on, sit down.
We're glad to have you with us.
♪ Bury your pain in you ♪
You will stand for your son Halima
This is the alpine wife's black fate.

text: Seni soframızda gördüğümüz için çok mutlu olduk
english: We're so happy to see you at our table.
My Ertugrul is not dead.
Ertugrul was the biggest Alps I ever knew.

text: Böyle bir Alp'in kaybını kabullenmek hepimiz için çok zor
english: It's hard for all of us to accept the loss of such an Alps.

text: Lakin senin için daha da zor kızım
english: But it's even harder for you, girl.
Brother
Like Sungur Tekin, it's not like that.

text: Ertuğrul'um için de sofraya bir tabak koyacağız
english: We'll put a plate on the table for my Ertugrul.
No more arguments from tomorrow.

text: İnşallah orada o boş tabakların sahiplerini görürüz
english: Let's hope we see the owners of those empty dishes over there.
Here you go.
Enjoy your meal.
Is there a sign, sir?
Come.
What's up, Abdurrahman?

text: Gündoğdu Bey'imin dediği gibi araziye çıkıp pusu attık Hayme Ana
english: As Mr. Gündüz said, we went out into the field and ambushed Hayme Ana.

text: Obanın geliş gidişini gözetleyen bir Moğol gördük
english: We saw a Mongol watching the Oban come and go.
Did you get him?
We've got it, Mother Hayme.
Huh.
Did he even talk?
Before I die
He said Noyan's leaving tomorrow.
I know where you're going

text: çektiğin ıstıraptan kurtulman için dua edeceğim
english: I'll pray you'll get rid of the pain you've suffered
For you to be reunited with your child.
Your father will be back, son.
He'll be back.
Don't worry about it.
Godspeed.
Thank you, Selcan Hatun.
♪ My sunup ♪
I have a bad feeling about this.
God is great, girl.
Let's go out and hope we come back.
Good-bye.

text: Ben Sadettin Köpek ile görüşmeye gidiyorum
english: I'm going to see Saditin Dog.
Have Ertuğrul in my absence
Don't worry about it.
Are you ready, Burrito?
I'm ready.
The one who goes hunting is the one who hunts.
Let them hunt.
Say hello to the hunters for me.
The other Alps are ready, sir.
They'll be waiting for you at the exit.
Thanks, Sasquatch.
We're ready, Ma.
May God help you.

text: Yüce Allah öcümüzü almayı nasip eylesin
english: May God Almighty give us our revenge.
I hope so, Uncle.

text: Atamız Oğuz'un şanına yaraşır bir intikam olacak baba
english: A vengeance worthy of the glory of our father, Oğuz

text: Zalimlere yiğitliğin ne demek olduğunu öğreteceğiz Allah'ın izniyle
english: We'll teach the oppressors what it's like to be brave, God willing.

Our faith is alive
Our Hizir guide
